properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 7:43AM CST until February 8 at 3:54AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Black Warrior River At Holt Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...Hale...
Marengo and Tuscaloosa Counties.
Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo...Sumter and Tuscaloosa Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of three to four inches with locally heavier
amounts have fallen over the Black Warrior basin...and a flood
warning is now in effect for much of the river.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Black Warrior River At Holt Lock and Dam.
* until late Friday night...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* At  6:45 AM Thursday The stage Was 138.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 140 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this morning and continue
to rise to near 143.7 feet by this evening. The river will fall
below flood stage by Friday afternoon .
* Impact...At 140 feet...Some minor flooding of low-lying areas
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
